comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*
Calling him anti-trump is a stretch; he vote For trump’s policies 90% of the time. Kinzinger can fuq right off

Kinzinger might be mildly anti-trump currently but he supported Trump strongly previously and is really not a good person. His hard Right politics are as toxic as many other GOP politicians. Do not be fooled.

At the end of the day, he did the least amount possible to stop Trump. He talked shit of Twitter, but he voted for Trump and most of his policies. He hasn't done anything to help keep a second Trump from coming to power.

Nah, it underscores Kinzinger's opportunism. Now that he's a regular talkinghead on the cable news circuit, he doesn't need the headache of ethics rules that come with a Congressional seat. He'll continue to provide a fig leaf of propriety for the GOP.
fealty to a person, instead of the country. what could go wrong?
But redditors were telling me Trump doesn't actually have the support of the party.

It doesn't.

The 16th District under the second draft redistricting map which was approved by Illinois legislators has been redrawn to include Kinzinger and LaHood.

LaHood is a much higher ranked neocons than Kinzinger. The neocons are jettisoning Kinzinger to keep LaHood.. 

LaHood also finance chair for the NRCC 2022.
The cult of Trump gets worse by the day
Minor Edit: Kinzinger retirement underscores Trump dominance over GQP
